headline: Netflix’s Lofty Valuation Has Even Bullish Investors Nervous

headline: Blackstone’s Cirsa set for Spanish stock market debut around July 9
summary: Investing.com -- Blackstone (NYSE:BX)’s gambling company Cirsa plans to list on the Spanish stock market on or around July 9, following approval from the CNMV regulator, the company announced Tuesday.
